NK123(go)002:1: // snga 'gyur rnying lugs theg dgu'i lam khrid kyi sa
NK123(go)002:2: bcad nyung ngu dam pa'i zhal lung zhes bya ba
NK123(go)002:3: bzhugs so // dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang
NK123(go)002:4: ngo bo dbyer ma mchis pa mnyam med bla ma
NK123(go)002:5: mchog gi zhabs kyi pad+mo la sgo gsum gus pa
NK123(go)002:6: chen pos phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o //
NK123(go)002:7: byin gyis brlabs par mdzad du gsol /
NK123(go)002:8: de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gyi
NK123(go)002:9: bsdus pa'i chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rin
NK123(go)002:10: po che gcig pur 'du ba yang /
NK123(go)002:11: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' la brtags pa'i le'u las /
NK123(go)002:12: sh+aa ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang
NK123(go)002:13: ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dang gzhan dpag
NK123(go)002:15: chos gcig po gang zhes na /
NK123(go)002:16: 'di lta ste bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub kyi sems te /
NK123(go)002:17: sh+aa ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po
NK123(go)002:18: de dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag
NK123(go)002:19: dang / gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to //
NK123(go)002:21: mdo sde bskal pa bzang po las /
NK123(go)002:22: gang dag byang chub mchog rab sems yod pa //
NK123(go)002:23: de dang de dag mi dman mtshungs med spyod //
NK123(go)002:24: de dag de ring 'jig rten nor chen rnyed //
NK123(go)002:25: de dag 'jig rten legs pa 'tsho bas 'tsho //
NK123(go)002:26: bdud rnams bcom ste bdud rtsi reg byas nas //
NK123(go)002:27: char sprin lhun sdug lta bur tshim par byed //
NK123(go)002:28: gang de byang chub lam zhugs 'jig rten skyobs //
NK123(go)002:29: de dag nor bdun dag gis sdud par byed //
NK123(go)002:30: gal te sdug bsngal brgya mang bzod byed pa //
NK123(go)002:31: de bas byang chub gang zhugs skyo mi 'gyur //
NK123(go)002:32: de yis yon tan de dag myur thob la //
NK123(go)002:33: 'jig rten kun gyi mchog ma dag tu'ang 'gyur //
NK123(go)002:34: zhes sogs mdo sde du ma las mang du gsungs te /
NK123(go)002:35: de na byang chub kyi sems rin po che gcig
NK123(go)002:36: pu yod na dkon mchog gsum gyi gdungs rgyun mi
NK123(go)002:37: 'chad par 'gyur ba yang 'phags pa rgya cher rol
NK123(go)002:38: pa'i mdo las / byang chub kyi sems ni chos
NK123(go)002:39: snang ba'i sgo ste dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun
NK123(go)002:41: zhes gsungs shing de nyid byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK123(go)002:42: kyi lam bgrod pa gcig pa yin pa'i tshul yang
NK123(go)002:43: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po byang chub
NK123(go)002:44: sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnams
NK123(go)002:46: gzhan yang mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK123(go)002:47: kyi lam ni mgo gcig pa ste de ni lam
NK123(go)002:49: 'di ltar ste byang chub sems gcig pu med par
NK123(go)002:50: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu grogs med
NK123(go)002:51: par shin tu brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthu yongs su
NK123(go)002:52: bzung ba'i bsam pas go cha bgos pa ste /
NK123(go)002:53: gzhan gyi ma bstan pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa /
NK123(go)002:54: bdag nyid byed pa bdag gi stobs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa ste /
NK123(go)002:55: de ltar go cha sra ba bgos nas sems can
NK123(go)002:56: thams cad kyi ma thob pa de bdag gis thob
NK123(go)002:57: par bya'o // gang 'phags pa thams cad dang /
NK123(go)002:58: gang theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
NK123(go)002:59: sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma thob pa de dag
NK123(go)002:61: sbyin pa ni nga yi grogs ma yin gyi nga ni sbyin pa'i grogs po /
NK123(go)002:62: tshul khrims ni nga yi grogs ma yin gyi /
NK123(go)002:66: shes rab ni nga yi grogs ma yin gyi nga ni de dag gi grogs po /
NK123(go)002:67: nga ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis bslang par bya ba ma yin gyis /
NK123(go)002:68: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nas bslang bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:69: gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
NK123(go)002:70: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rgyas par shes par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:71: nga ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis bslang bya ba ma yin gyis /
NK123(go)002:72: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ngas bslang bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:73: zhes de lta bu'i chos rnams la grogs med cing
NK123(go)002:74: nga gcig pu gnyis su med par rdo rje'i gdan
NK123(go)002:75: la 'dug nas bdud stobs dang bcas pa btul te
NK123(go)002:76: skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes kyi bla na
NK123(go)002:77: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
NK123(go)002:78: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:79: zhes de la nges par rtog pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor
NK123(go)002:80: ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam bgrod pa
NK123(go)002:82: de lta na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam
NK123(go)002:83: bgrod pa gcig pu la mkhas pa shes rab kyi
NK123(go)002:84: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
NK123(go)002:85: de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bgrod pa gcig pa la mkhas pa ste /
NK123(go)002:86: de ltar na byang chub kyi lam la mkhas pa
NK123(go)002:87: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
NK123(go)002:88: do // zhes rgya cher gsungs shing /
NK123(go)002:89: tshig 'di dag gis ni kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid gtan la phab pa yin la /
NK123(go)002:90: gzhan du don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang du byas te /
NK123(go)002:93: yang dag bsam na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te /
NK123(go)002:95: 'di ltar te chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par rjes su mthong ba'o //
NK123(go)002:96: zhes sogs mang du gsungs pa dang mthun par rjod
NK123(go)002:97: pa chen po'i rgyud sde rnams su brjod bya'i gtso
NK123(go)002:99: de na de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems rin po che de rgyu gang las skye na /
NK123(go)002:100: 'di la bzhed tshul mi 'dra ba mang du yod kyang /
NK123(go)002:101: re zhig bden bzhi'i 'jug ldog la dmigs pa'i tshad med pa'i snying rje chen po las skyes te /
NK123(go)002:102: de yang 'dir tshad med pa bzhis rab tu phye ba can no //
NK123(go)002:103: de skad du yang dkon mchog brtsegs las /
NK123(go)002:104: snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i phyir sems la lta ba'o //
NK123(go)002:105: yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'o //
NK123(go)002:107: bardzusa te skye ba dag las bltas te byams pa bsgom par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:110: na ba dang 'chi ba las snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:111: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
NK123(go)002:113: rang bzhin gyi 'dus ma byas pa la dga' ba dang btang snyoms ma sgom par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:114: 'jam dpal de lta bas na rgyu ni tshad med pa bzhin no //
NK123(go)002:115: des bskyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
NK123(go)002:116: de'i phyir de la nan tan du yid la bya'o //
NK123(go)002:117: zhes tshad med pa bzhi so so'i dmigs pa dang bcas pa gsal bar gsungs so //
NK123(go)002:118: de yang skye ba rnam bzhis bsdus pa zag pa
NK123(go)002:119: dang bcas pa'i chos sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi phyogs
NK123(go)002:120: dag ni byams pa dang snying rje dag gi dmigs
NK123(go)002:121: par bshad la / zag med kyi chos spyi dang
NK123(go)002:122: 'gog lam gyi bden pa'i phyogs dag ni dga' ba
NK123(go)002:123: dang btang snyoms dag gi dmigs par 'dir re zhig
NK123(go)002:124: par bshad la / bshad do // de ltar na
NK123(go)002:125: bden pa bzhi'i dang po sdug bden gyi mtshan nyid
NK123(go)002:126: mi rtag pa sogs bzhi'i dang po sgom pa la
NK123(go)002:127: par bshad la / bshad do // yang / rnying
NK123(go)002:128: lugs man ngag las sa bcad bdun du byas nas
NK123(go)002:130: 'dir re zhig gnas skabs tshe srog mi rtag pa'i
NK123(go)002:131: rang bzhin la bsam nas tshe 'di sgrub pa'i blo
NK123(go)002:132: sna ldog thabs la 'bad de dang /
NK123(go)002:133: mthar thug 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa la
NK123(go)002:134: bsam nas 'khor ba mtha' dag las yid 'byung bar
NK123(go)002:135: bshad pa ste gnyis su 'du zhing /
NK123(go)002:136: de lta bu'i thabs de dag kyang bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi /
NK123(go)002:137: gdam ngag kho na las 'byung phyir thog mar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa nyid gal che la /
NK123(go)002:138: tshul de yang phal cher dal ba'i rten 'ba' zhig
NK123(go)002:139: las 'byung ba'i phyir rang nyid legs su 'dod pa'i
NK123(go)002:140: skye bo dag gis dag po nyid du 'khor ba
NK123(go)002:141: spyi dang bye brag mi khoms pa'i rang bzhin la
NK123(go)002:142: bsam nas / de las thar pa dal ba'i ngo
NK123(go)002:143: bo dang 'byor ba'i khyad par dag shin tu rnyed
NK123(go)002:144: par dka' ba'i dpe don la bsam ste rang nyid
NK123(go)002:145: kyis thob pa'i rten la yid bzhin nor bu rnyed
NK123(go)002:146: pa lta bu spro dga' mchog tu bskyed nas da
NK123(go)002:147: res kyi rten 'di la tshe 'di dang gtan gyi
NK123(go)002:148: don 'grub pa zhig ci nas kyang bya /
NK123(go)002:149: de yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par gda' bas na /
NK123(go)002:150: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bla ma zhig btsal nas
NK123(go)002:151: ci gsungs bka' bzhin du bsgrub cing brten par bya'o
NK123(go)002:152: snyam pa ste 'di'i tshul mdo sde rgyan las bshad
NK123(go)002:153: pa ltar sa bcad brgyad kyis rtogs par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:154: de'i rjes su bla ma'i gdam ngag dang po tshe
NK123(go)002:155: 'di mi rtag pa'i tshul du thabs du mas bsgom
NK123(go)002:156: zhing rjes su dran pa drug yid la bya ste
NK123(go)002:157: / de yang dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa skyabs 'gro la 'bad pa dang /
NK123(go)002:158: 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i bde ba rjes su dran zhing /
NK123(go)002:159: de'i rgyu gtong ba dang tshul khrims rjes su dran
NK123(go)002:160: pas bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun sogs sbyin
NK123(go)002:162: phyi rol pas sgro btags pa'i byed po bdag la
NK123(go)002:163: sogs pa rnam par gsal ba'i 'jig rten pa'i yang
NK123(go)002:164: dag pa'i lta ba la nges pa drangs te /
NK123(go)002:165: mi dge ba bcu spong ba'i tshul khrims bsrung ba
NK123(go)002:166: dang bsam gzugs brgyad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang tshangs
NK123(go)002:167: gnas bzhi sems can la dmigs pa can dag sgom
NK123(go)002:168: pa ste 'di dag gis ni thog mar dge ba'i
NK123(go)002:169: lam steg lha mi'i theg pa'i khrid kyi go rim
NK123(go)002:171: gzhung gzhan las skyes bu chung ngus lam dang yang don gcig go //
NK123(go)002:172: de nas bla ma'i gdam ngag gnyis pa 'dus byas mtha' dag mi rtag pa dang /
NK123(go)002:173: sdug bsngal ba sogs bden bzhi lhag ma rnams kyi
NK123(go)002:174: 'jug ldog la 'bad pas mthong lam gyi ye shes
NK123(go)002:175: bskyed pa'i nye rgyu mngon du byed /
NK123(go)002:176: 'di skabs lam bden bslab gsum du bsdu ba'i gnad
NK123(go)002:177: nges par byas nas der bsdus pa sogs so so'i
NK123(go)002:178: skye bo tshul khrims sogs bslab pa rjes mthun pa
NK123(go)002:180: de dag gi rnam bzhag kyang chos mngon pa'i mdzod dang /
NK123(go)002:181: mdo rgyan sogs las khong du chud par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:182: 'di dag gis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam rin yang zhar la song /
NK123(go)002:183: de nas kun nyon dang rnam byang phyogs kyi bsdus
NK123(go)002:184: pa'i rten 'brel dag gis bden bzhi'i 'jug ldog gzhan
NK123(go)002:185: bstan pa la legs par bsam shing /
NK123(go)002:186: shes nas blang dor la brtson par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:187: des rang rgyal gyi theg pa'i lam rim song ste /
NK123(go)002:188: de ltar gzhung gzhan las skyes bu 'bring gi lam bskyed pa yang 'di dag tu 'dus so //
NK123(go)002:189: de nas yul bden pa bzhi po de dag la
NK123(go)002:190: dmigs pa'i tshad med pa rnam pa bzhi chos la
NK123(go)002:191: dmigs pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
NK123(go)002:192: can dag par bsgom nas yid 'khrul bar gyur pa
NK123(go)002:193: dmigs pa dang / na / sngar smos pa'i skyabs
NK123(go)002:194: su 'gro ba de nyid sems can gyi don la
NK123(go)002:195: dmigs pa la sogs pas khyad par byas pa dang
NK123(go)002:196: dmigs pa dang / na / / tshad med pa'i
NK123(go)002:197: rab tu dbye ba'i snying rje chen po dag mngon
NK123(go)002:198: dmigs pa dang / na / / du byas te
NK123(go)002:199: / tshogs bsags pa'i sgo thams cad yan lag bdun
NK123(go)002:200: par bsdus nas sbyor ba de dag sngon du 'gro
NK123(go)002:201: ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa'i bslab sdom gzhan
NK123(go)002:203: de ltar sdom pa thob nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la nan tan bya ste /
NK123(go)002:204: 'dis rnam par bzhag pa yang mdo sde rgyan las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin nges par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:205: 'on te dbye bsdu'i rnam pa tha dad pa dag
NK123(go)002:206: las 'dir kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i byang chub
NK123(go)002:207: kyi sems gnyis su dbye ba ni /
NK123(go)002:209: de las dang po kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi dbang du byas te /
NK123(go)002:210: de nyid kyi bslab pa'i gnas mtha' dag gi bslab pa gnyis su 'du ba la /
NK123(go)002:211: dang po smon pa'i bslab bya ni sngar bshad pa'i
NK123(go)002:212: tshad med pa bzhi po nyid bdag gzhan mnyam pa
NK123(go)002:213: dang / bdag gzhan barje ba dang /
NK123(go)002:214: bdag las gzhan gces pa gsum gyis go rim bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:215: de nas gnyis pa 'jug pa sems bskyed kyi bslab bya ni /
NK123(go)002:216: rgyas pa pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /
NK123(go)002:217: de yang bslab pa gsum du bsdus nas nyams su blang bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:218: 'di gzhung gzhan du dbye na gnyis su yod pa las /
NK123(go)002:219: dang po'i dbang du byas te /
NK123(go)002:220: tshul khrims rnam pa gsum dang /
NK123(go)002:221: sems gnas pa'i thabs dgu'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa las /
NK123(go)002:222: de'i mi mthun phyogs nyes pa lnga'i gnyen por spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad brten nas sgom pa dang /
NK123(go)002:223: gzhal bya'i chos rnams la 'jal byed kyi tshad ma dag gis legs par gzhal ba'i grub don /
NK123(go)002:224: chos thams cad mtshan nyid gsum dang /
NK123(go)002:225: de yang bden pa gnyis su gtan la 'beb pa'i gnad gsang nges par byas nas /
NK123(go)002:226: mthar thug bdag gnyis kyis stong pa'i stong nyid spros
NK123(go)002:227: pa thams cad dang bral ba gnyis snang gi blo'i
NK123(go)002:228: yul las 'das pa 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi mtshan
NK123(go)002:229: nyid rnam par zhig pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK123(go)002:230: ngo bo nyid du bden pa dbyer med pa'i don
NK123(go)002:232: tshul 'dis ni byang sems kyi theg pa thun mong ba'i rnam par bzhag pa song ste /
NK123(go)002:233: de ltar na dngos gzhi nges 'byung gi theg pa'i khrid kyi sa bcad bshad zin te /
NK123(go)002:234: skyes bu chen po'i lam gyis phyogs gcig thal lo //
NK123(go)002:235: de nas gzhung de nyid kyi man ngag bla na
NK123(go)002:236: med pa 'bras bu'i theg pa la brten nas tshe
NK123(go)002:237: 'dir mgon po rdo rje'i 'chang gi go 'phang mngon
NK123(go)002:238: du byas nas rang gzhan gyi don gnyis rgya chen
NK123(go)002:239: po myur du sgrub pa'i 'dun pa bskyed de zab
NK123(go)002:240: mo'i lam rjes su sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o
NK123(go)002:241: // 'dir yang phyin drug bslab gsum gyis bsdus pa'i
NK123(go)002:242: lam gnad nges par byed pa ni gzhir bzhag pa'o
NK123(go)002:243: // // de ltar na zab mo'i lam de ltar lta spyod kyi sgo nas dbye na /
NK123(go)002:244: spyod pa gtso bor ston pa bya ba'i rgyud dang /
NK123(go)002:245: lta ba spyod pa gtso bor ston pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de gnyis su 'gyur ro //
NK123(go)002:246: snga ma la'ang bya rgyud dngos dang /
NK123(go)002:247: cha mthun gyi rgyud dam spyod rgyud gnyis yod /
NK123(go)002:248: phyi ma la'ang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud tsam dang /
NK123(go)002:249: rnal 'byor bla na med rgyud de gnyis su dbye ba las rgyud sde bzhir 'gyur ro //
NK123(go)002:250: 'di dag tu yang rgyud sde rang rang gi dbang
NK123(go)002:251: dang 'brel ba'i rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam
NK123(go)002:252: tshig rnams tshul bzhin bsrung ba'i tshul khrims kyi bslab
NK123(go)002:253: pa dang / mtshan bcas dang mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i ting nge 'a dzin dang /
NK123(go)002:254: de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa'i lhar 'dod pa'i
NK123(go)002:255: dbang gis de'i stong gzhi chos can kyang lhar 'dod
NK123(go)002:256: do bden pa dbyer med pa'i phyir dang /
NK123(go)002:257: chos sku'i rten gzugs sku yin dgos pa'i phyir te /
NK123(go)002:258: des na bden pa dbyer med sgrub byed dus byas
NK123(go)002:259: pa'i kun rdzob lha snang sgyu mar blta ba dang
NK123(go)002:260: / bde stong gnyis med kyi ye shes dag gis
NK123(go)002:261: rab tu dbye ba'i shes rab kyi bslab pa ste
NK123(go)002:262: / / 'di lta bu'i thabs shes khyad par can
NK123(go)002:263: dag gis mtshan ma'i rnam rtog mtha' dag sdom par
NK123(go)002:264: byed pa'i sgo nas tshogs gnyis myur du rdzogs shing
NK123(go)002:265: sgrib gnyis 'phral du dag pa'i tshe 'dir 'bras bu
NK123(go)002:267: bye brag tu bya ba'i rgyud dag ni /
NK123(go)002:268: spyod pa'ang blang dor dang bcas shing gzhi 'bras kyi
NK123(go)002:269: lha la mchog dman du lta ba'i dbang gi ting
NK123(go)002:270: nge 'dzin gyi lhar snang sgom pa na'ang bdag mdun
NK123(go)002:271: dam ye rje khol gyi rnam par bsgom nas dngos
NK123(go)002:272: grub thob par 'dod cing bdag bskyed kyi lha yab
NK123(go)002:273: yum phan tshun bltas pa'i bde ba tsam las byung
NK123(go)002:274: ba'i ye shes lam du byed pa'i /
NK123(go)002:275: 'di sgrub bya'i lha dang 'bras bu'i khyad par dag ni gzhan las rtogs par bya'o //
NK123(go)002:276: de dag gi bya rgyud kyi theg pa'i rnam bzhag thal lo //
NK123(go)002:277: de bzhin du spyod pa'i rgyud dag las ni lta
NK123(go)002:278: spyod cha mnyam du spyod cing gzhi 'bras kyi rang
NK123(go)002:279: bzhin dag mnyam du lta ba'i dbang gis ting nge
NK123(go)002:280: 'dzin gyi lha yang yun nam grogs po'i tshul du
NK123(go)002:282: bde bas khyad par yang lha yab yum phan tshun
NK123(go)002:283: zhal 'dzum pa las byung ba'i bde stong gi ye
NK123(go)002:284: shes lam du byed pas 'bras bu sbyor tshul sogs
NK123(go)002:286: nges spyod rgyud kyi theg pa'i lam gnad thal lo //
NK123(go)002:287: rnal 'byor rgyud las ni nang gi rnal 'byor gtso
NK123(go)002:288: bor ston zhing gzhi 'bras kyi lha rang bzhin dbyer
NK123(go)002:289: med du blta ba'i dbang gis ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK123(go)002:290: lha bsgom pa na'ang bdag dam tshig sems dpa' dbyings
NK123(go)002:291: nas spyan drangs te dbyer med du bstim nas phyag
NK123(go)002:292: rgya bzhi las mi 'da' bar bgyis te dngos grub
NK123(go)002:293: thob par 'dod cing lha yab yum phan tshun phyag
NK123(go)002:294: sbrel ba las byung ba'i bde stong ye shes lam
NK123(go)002:295: du byed do // 'di dag gis ni phyi rgyud
NK123(go)002:296: sde gsum du snang ba'i lhar blta ba med pa
NK123(go)002:297: du byed do // dang / bde stong gi ye
NK123(go)002:298: shes lam du byed pa med pa bshad pa dag
NK123(go)002:299: rnam par gsal ba yin no //
NK123(go)002:300: 'dir lung gi sbyor ba ni mang du yod kyang 'dir re zhig ma spros so //
NK123(go)002:301: de dag gis ni rnal 'byor rgyud kyi theg pa'i lam thal lo //
NK123(go)002:302: da ni rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi
NK123(go)002:303: 'brel 'god pa la pha ma gnyis med kyi rgyud
NK123(go)002:305: dang po ma h+aa yo ga ni lta ba lhag
NK123(go)002:306: pa'i bden pa dbyer med blos spyod yul dang bral
NK123(go)002:307: ba rtogs pa'i chos thams cad la blangs dor med
NK123(go)002:308: par mnyam pa'i spyod pa la gnas bzhin lam bskyed
NK123(go)002:309: pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gtso bor ston zhing
NK123(go)002:310: rdzogs pa'i rim pa lnga la'ang ji rigs par brtson
NK123(go)002:311: pas gnas shing skabs kyi 'bras bu rig 'dzin gyi
NK123(go)002:312: sa dang / mthar thug rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid mngon du byed pa ste /
NK123(go)002:313: 'di yan gyis lha yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i
NK123(go)002:314: bde ba las byung ba'i rang byung gi ye shes
NK123(go)002:315: lam du byed cing lam gyi rim pa dang dbang
NK123(go)002:316: bzhi'i go rim gyi sa bgrod par byed pa'ang mtshungs
NK123(go)002:317: pa yin no // de yang tshogs lam du bskyed
NK123(go)002:318: rim rags pa phyag rgya gcig pa dang 'brel ba'i
NK123(go)002:319: pa yin no // dben gsum dang / sbyor lam
NK123(go)002:320: du bskyed rim phra ba phyag rgya spros bcas dang
NK123(go)002:321: 'brel ba'i sgyu lus dag rim par bsgom zhing skabs
NK123(go)002:322: der tshom bu tshogs sgrub kyi spyod pa'i nye rgyud
NK123(go)002:323: la brten nas rlung sems tsam las grub pa'i sgyu
NK123(go)002:324: ma'i sku rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK123(go)002:325: de nyid 'od gsal du 'jug pas mthong lam mngon du byas te tshe dbang rig 'dzin thob cing /
NK123(go)002:326: de nas sgom lam gyi dngos gzhi mthar slob pa'i
NK123(go)002:327: zung 'jug gis bsdus pa'i phyag chen dang lhun grub
NK123(go)002:328: rig 'dzin dag rim par bgrod nas mi slob pa'i
NK123(go)002:329: lam du 'bras brgyud kyi ngo bo mi slob pa'i
NK123(go)002:330: zung 'jug gi sku kha sbyor bdun ldan mngon du
NK123(go)002:331: byed pa'o // de ma h+aa yo ga'i theg pa'i lam rim mdor bshad zin to //
NK123(go)002:332: de nas lung a nu yo gar ni dbyings dang
NK123(go)002:333: ye shes gnyis su med pa'i sras bde ba chen
NK123(go)002:334: po'i ngo bor mtshan rtog sdom pa nyid khyad par
NK123(go)002:335: du byas pa'i gsang dbang dang sher dbang gi lam
NK123(go)002:336: gyi nyams len de brjod bya'i gtso bor byas nas
NK123(go)002:337: bskyed rim ji rigs pa dang 'brel ba'i rdzogs rim
NK123(go)002:338: mtshan bcas dang / mtshan ma med pa dag la gnad du bsnun pa ste /
NK123(go)002:339: 'dir 'od gsal gyi bye brag dga' bzhis drangs pa'i
NK123(go)002:340: lhan skyes dpe yi 'od gsal re bsgrub bya'i gtso
NK123(go)002:342: lam gyi bgrod tshul kyang so so'i skye bo'i sa lnga dang /
NK123(go)002:343: 'phags pa lnga bcas rang lugs kyi sa bcu'i rnam
NK123(go)002:344: bzhag tha dad pa dag yod pa gzhan las rtogs
NK123(go)002:345: par bya'o // des a nu yo ga'i theg pa'i sa bcad grub bo //
NK123(go)002:346: de dag gi rjes su gtso bor 'phags pa'i nyams
NK123(go)002:347: len gyis bsdus pa'i don dam pa'i byang chub sems
NK123(go)002:348: kyi sgom rim rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo
NK123(go)002:349: ga'i lam nyams su blangs bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:350: 'dir ni chos thams cad mnyam par ris med chen
NK123(go)002:351: por rtogs pas rdzogs rim las kyang khyad par mtshan
NK123(go)002:352: ma med pa'i rdzogs rim snang stong gi 'od gsal
NK123(go)002:353: dag dang de dag gis zung 'jug pa'i lam gtso
NK123(go)002:355: khreg chod stong pa'i 'od gsal dang thod rgal snang
NK123(go)002:356: ba'i 'od gsal dang zung du 'jug pa'i snang bzhi'i
NK123(go)002:357: rim par bgrod pa'i mthar nang gzhon nu bum skur
NK123(go)002:358: grags pa ngo bo nyid kyi skur gtan srid zin
NK123(go)002:359: pa'i ye shes chos sku mi slob pa'i zung 'jug
NK123(go)002:360: gis bsdus pa mang du 'pho ba chen po grub
NK123(go)002:361: pa yin no // 'di skabs snang bzhi thun mong gi sa lam dang sbyar ba na /
NK123(go)002:362: chos nyid mngon sum tshogs lam dang /
NK123(go)002:363: nyams snang gong 'phel sbyor lam dang /
NK123(go)002:364: rig pa tshad phebs mthong lam dang /
NK123(go)002:365: chos nyid mngon sum sgom lam du sbyor ba yod kyang /
NK123(go)002:366: de ni dman lam sngon song gi theg chen tshogs
NK123(go)002:367: lam pa sogs bzhin du 'phags pa'i spyor lam dngos
NK123(go)002:368: rjes gsum gyi cha lags bzhag pa'i rang lam thun
NK123(go)002:369: mong ma yin pa nyid yin par bya ste /
NK123(go)002:370: gzhan du na so so'i skye bos sar yang don
NK123(go)002:371: dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems mtshan nyid mngon sum
NK123(go)002:372: par bsgom du thal ba dang /
NK123(go)002:373: de ltar gyur na de 'phags pa'i sems bskyed kyis
NK123(go)002:374: rab tu phye ba ma yin par thal ba'i skyon
NK123(go)002:376: 'on kyang a ti yo ga'i rgyud 'dir so so'i
NK123(go)002:377: skyes bo'i gnas skabs su'ang ji rigs par nyams su
NK123(go)002:378: blang rung ba'i chos 'ga' zhig ni yod de de
NK123(go)002:380: 'di nyid kyi thun mong gi sngon 'gro bshad pa'i sems sbyong bdun la sogs pa rnams dang /
NK123(go)002:381: lha mi sems 'dzin sogs zhi gnas sgrub pa'i thabs dag dang /
NK123(go)002:382: sgra bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang lus ngag yid gsum gyi
NK123(go)002:383: sngon 'gro thun mong ma yin pa rnams dang bcas
NK123(go)002:384: gtso bor tshogs lam du nyams su blang rung dang
NK123(go)002:385: / de rjes sbyor lam du phyi nang gi 'khor
NK123(go)002:386: 'das ru shan dbye ba'i spyod pas mtshams sbyor nas
NK123(go)002:387: rdzogs chen gyi rang lam dngos gzhir 'jug pa yin
NK123(go)002:388: / no // de ltar na 'dir thun mong gi
NK123(go)002:389: sngon 'gro'i lam gnad rnams ni lha mi nyan rang
NK123(go)002:390: dang bcas pa'i theg par bshad zin pa rnams dang
NK123(go)002:392: thun mong ma yin pa'i sngon 'gro dag ni kun
NK123(go)002:393: rdzob byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rim pa man
NK123(go)002:394: ngag dang bcas pa ji ltar bshad pa rnams dang
NK123(go)002:395: tha dad du ma gyur pa'i lam gnad nges par
NK123(go)002:397: de ltar shes na theg pa rim pa dagu'am lngas
NK123(go)002:398: bsdus pa mtha' dag gang zag gcig 'tshang rgya ba'i
NK123(go)002:399: lam gyi cha rkyen du 'grel shes shing /
NK123(go)002:400: de yang byang chub kyi sems gnyis bsgom pa'i rim
NK123(go)002:401: pa las gzhan la yin pa yang rtogs par 'gyur
NK123(go)002:402: ba yin no // de dag gis ni rdzogs pa
NK123(go)002:403: chen po a ti yo ga'i khrid kyi sa bcad
NK123(go)002:404: ba yin no // thal te / skyes bu chen
NK123(go)002:405: po lam gyi rim pa yongs su rdzogs pa thal
NK123(go)002:406: ba yin no // thal te / lo // de
NK123(go)002:407: ltar na rgyud sde bzhi'am drug gis bsdus pa'i tha
NK123(go)002:408: mar dge ba man ngag bla na med pa'i khrid
NK123(go)002:409: kyi rim pa rnams rdzogs so //
NK123(go)002:410: 'di ltar theg pa rim dgu'i lam rim gyis bsdus
NK123(go)002:411: pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rim pa mtha'
NK123(go)002:412: dag sgom / dge ba gsum gyi sa bcad kyi
NK123(go)002:413: 'ching ba'i lugs 'di snga 'gyur gyi mdo rgyud dang
NK123(go)002:414: man ngag dag las ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin bkod
NK123(go)002:415: dag sgom / pa ste / de'i rgyu mtshan yang 'phags pa chos rjes su dran pa las /
NK123(go)002:416: dam pa'i chos ni thog mar dge ba /
NK123(go)002:418: tha mar dge ba zhes sogs gsung pa'i don /
NK123(go)002:419: dkon mchog gi za ma tog bkod pa'i mdo las /
NK123(go)002:420: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi /
NK123(go)002:423: tha mar dge ba gang zhe na /
NK123(go)002:424: de la thog mar dge ba ni byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'o //
NK123(go)002:425: bar du dge ba ni theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa'o //
NK123(go)002:426: tha mar dge ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bsngo ba'o //
NK123(go)002:427: gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i byams pa chen po'o //
NK123(go)002:428: bar du dge ba ni sems can thams cad la
NK123(go)002:429: bya ba ci yod snyom pa'i snying rje chen po'o
NK123(go)002:432: btang snyoms mnyam pa'i sems kyis nges par sems pa'o //
NK123(go)002:433: gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni ser snas sems tshar gcod pa dang /
NK123(go)002:434: 'char ba'i tshul khrims spong ba dang /
NK123(go)002:437: rnam par g.yeng ba kun tu mi spyod pa dang /
NK123(go)002:438: 'chal ba'i shes rab spong ba'o bar du dge ba ni /
NK123(go)002:443: shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
NK123(go)002:444: tha mar dge ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa
NK123(go)002:445: drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa
NK123(go)002:446: nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'o //
NK123(go)002:447: gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos
NK123(go)002:448: po bzhi'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o
NK123(go)002:449: // bar du dge ba ni lus dang srog la
NK123(go)002:450: mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o
NK123(go)002:451: // // tha mar dge ba ni skyon med par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'o //
NK123(go)002:452: tha mar dge ba ni dbang thob pa ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste /
NK123(go)002:453: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thog mar dge ba dang /
NK123(go)002:456: zhes gsungs pa'i don phyogs sdeb byas nas khrid rim du 'god pa'i lugs so //
NK123(go)002:457: 'di lta bu'i lam ji lta ba bzhin lag len
NK123(go)002:458: du 'gel ba la thog mar dal 'byor la snying
NK123(go)002:459: po len 'dod kyis bla ma bsten nas gdams ngag
NK123(go)002:460: thob zin pa'i rjes thog der mi rtag pa dang
NK123(go)002:461: tshad med pa'i blo sbyong dag gzhung nas bshad pa
NK123(go)002:462: bzhin rgyud la khel ba na tshogs lam du 'dun
NK123(go)002:463: pa sems bskyed la sogs pa dang 'brel bar sngags
NK123(go)002:464: lam spyi dang khyad par dbang snga ma gnyis kyi
NK123(go)002:465: lam bskyed rim rags pa rdzogs rim dben gsum dang
NK123(go)002:466: bcas pa la nan tan bya zhing /
NK123(go)002:467: de dag mthar phyin pa na bskyed rim phra ba
NK123(go)002:468: dang dbang gsum pa'i nyams len rdzogs rim gtum mo
NK123(go)002:469: dang sgyu lus nye rgyu'i spyod pa dang bcas pa
NK123(go)002:470: la brten nas 'od gsal dang zung 'jug gis bsdus
NK123(go)002:471: pa tshig dbang gi lam rdzogs pa chen po don
NK123(go)002:472: dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems rin po che sgom
NK123(go)002:474: de dag kyang snying thig gi 'das rjes la mi rtag snying rje byang sems sbyongs /
NK123(go)002:476: rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
NK123(go)002:477: 'dul ba'i dbang gi lha dang mi'i theg pa dang /
NK123(go)002:478: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
NK123(go)002:479: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
NK123(go)002:480: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /
NK123(go)002:481: bla na med pa'i theg pas 'dul bas /
NK123(go)002:483: theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la /
NK123(go)002:484: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bu gnas /
NK123(go)002:486: de las kyang lha mi'i theg pa lam stegs su 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan slob dpon klu sgrub kyis /
NK123(go)002:487: mi yi chos lugs legs spyod na //
NK123(go)002:488: lha yul bsgrod pa thag mi ring //
NK123(go)002:489: lha dang mi yi them skas la //
NK123(go)002:493: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
NK123(go)002:494: theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas //
NK123(go)002:495: zhes gsungs pa dag gi phyir yin la /
NK123(go)002:496: lam gyi rim pa 'di ni mngon rtog rgyan las /
NK123(go)002:497: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang /
NK123(go)002:498: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sa mtshams dang go rim
NK123(go)002:499: slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i rgyan 'grel don gsal
NK123(go)002:500: du gtan la bab pa dang mthun zhing mdo rgyan
NK123(go)002:501: sogs las byang sems sgom pa'i go rim bshad pa
NK123(go)002:502: dag dang yang mi 'gal bar bgyis te bshad shing
NK123(go)002:503: / sngags lam bslab gsum gyi man ngag yin pa dang /
NK123(go)002:504: khyad par byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
NK123(go)002:505: la sogs rdzogs chen gyi rgyud sems smad bco brgyad
NK123(go)002:506: kyis mtshon pa'i sems klong man ngag gi rgyud mtha'
NK123(go)002:507: dag gi don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems sgom
NK123(go)002:508: pa'i man ngag yin pa'ang dengs dus kyi skye bo
NK123(go)002:509: rnams kyis mi shes par 'dug pa'i phyir /
NK123(go)002:510: de dag gsal bar brjod pa yin no //
NK123(go)002:511: de ltar mthar thug theg pa gcig tu sgrub pa'i
NK123(go)002:512: tshul 'di dag mdo sde pad+ma dkar po sogs las
NK123(go)002:513: gsung pa dang mthun par dkon rtsegs kyis lha mo
NK123(go)002:514: dpal phreng gis zhus pa'i le'u ste 'dus pa bzhi
NK123(go)002:516: bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rang sangs rgyas 'khor
NK123(go)002:517: ba'i 'jig pa las brgal ba de ma thag tu
NK123(go)002:518: rnam par grol ba dag gis bde ba nyams blang
NK123(go)002:519: ba rnam ni 'di ltar bdag ni 'khor ba'i 'jig
NK123(go)002:520: pa rnams las yongs su grol gyi bdag gis ni
NK123(go)002:521: phyin chad 'khor ba'i 'jig pa myong bar mi 'gyur
NK123(go)002:522: ro // snyam du yang dag par mthong ste /
NK123(go)002:523: bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs
NK123(go)002:524: rgyas rnams ni 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi
NK123(go)002:525: shes so zhes bgyi bar rtogs nas dbugs phyin pa'i
NK123(go)002:526: mchog mya ngan las 'das pa'i sar so sor rtog
NK123(go)002:527: go // bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rtogs nas
NK123(go)002:528: kyang sa de la rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos
NK123(go)002:530: bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi dring
NK123(go)002:531: mi 'jog par bdag gis ni 'di ltar lhag ma
NK123(go)002:532: dang bcas pa'i sa thob ste /
NK123(go)002:533: bdag bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
NK123(go)002:534: byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro snyam du 'tshal
NK123(go)002:535: lo // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
NK123(go)002:536: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
NK123(go)002:537: theg pa rnams ni theg pa chen po la mu
NK123(go)002:538: nag gi sar 'du ba'i slad du ste /
NK123(go)002:539: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba
NK123(go)002:540: de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig bla dwags
NK123(go)002:541: so // bcom ldan 'das de ltar na theg pa
NK123(go)002:542: gsum po 'di dag ni theg pa gcig kho nas
NK123(go)002:543: so // grang du mchi'o // bcom ldan 'das theg
NK123(go)002:544: pa gcig rtogs pas bla na med pa yang dag
NK123(go)002:545: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro //
NK123(go)002:546: bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i yang dag par
NK123(go)002:547: rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi ba de ni mya
NK123(go)002:548: ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dwags so
NK123(go)002:549: // bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
NK123(go)002:550: shes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
NK123(go)002:551: kyi sku'i tshig bla dwags so //
NK123(go)002:552: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig pa lag ste /
NK123(go)002:553: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lags chos kyi sku yang gzhan ma lags kyi /
NK123(go)002:554: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid chos kyi sku lags so //
NK123(go)002:555: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig gi mtha' lags so //
NK123(go)002:556: bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi mtha' zhes bgyi
NK123(go)002:557: ba de ni theg pa gcig gi mthar sbyang ba'i
NK123(go)002:559: zhes gsung ba ltar gtan la phab pa yin no //
NK123(go)002:560: 'di ltar bkri ba'i go rim nges par yang /
NK123(go)002:561: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che las /
NK123(go)002:563: de la byang chub sems las dang po ni /
NK123(go)002:564: thog ma nyid du kha don la yongs su bskul bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:565: dge ba'i bshes su gyur nas dben pa gnas pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:566: don shes dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes su bskul bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:567: dge ba'i bshes su gyur nas nga lo bde ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:568: nga lo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la yongs su bskul bya'o //
NK123(go)002:569: dus shes nas mi 'jig pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:570: mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:571: don shes nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:572: chos kyi rjes su 'gro bar gyur nas rmong pa med pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:573: rmongs pa med par gyur nas rnam par dgod pa la bskul bar bya'o //
NK123(go)002:575: sems can thams cad de la de bas kyang shas cher /
NK123(go)002:576: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po mngon du gzhog par bya ba dang /
NK123(go)002:577: gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang /
NK123(go)002:578: bdag nyid gzhan gyi drang 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te /
NK123(go)002:579: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di dag las dang po pa'i byang chub sems rnams rnam par dgod pa'o //
NK123(go)002:581: 'di'i go rim ni khrid rkang rnams dang rim pa bzhin sbyar du yod do //
NK123(go)002:582: de ltar na khrid kyi sa bcad rnams mdor bsdus te legs par bshad zin to //
NK123(go)002:584: dal ba'i rten la snying rje len 'dod pa'i //
NK123(go)002:585: bshes gnyen dam pa brten nas de'i gdams ngag /
NK123(go)002:586: mi rtag la sogs bden bzhi'i 'jug ldog la //
NK123(go)002:587: dmigs pa'i tshad med bzhi yi blo sbyongs mthar //
NK123(go)002:588: tshogs bsags pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'i //
NK123(go)002:589: skyabs 'gro'i sbyor ba las skyes byang chub sems //
NK123(go)002:590: kun rdzob pa dang de yi bslab bya'i gnas //
NK123(go)002:591: thun mong dang ni thun min man ngag bcas //
NK123(go)002:592: legs par rgyud la brten mthar don dam pa'i //
NK123(go)002:593: byang chub sems mchog bsgom pa'i lam gyi rim //
NK123(go)002:594: rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag la brten nas //
NK123(go)002:595: mi slob mchog gi zung 'jug mngon byed mdzod //
NK123(go)002:596: ces snga 'gyur rnying ma'i theg dgu'i lam khrid kyi sa bcad mdor bsdus pa 'di yang /
NK123(go)002:597: rang nyid kyi slob bu rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs
NK123(go)002:598: pa rgyal sras zhi ba bzang po nas ji ltar
NK123(go)002:599: bskul bzhin chos smra ba'i btsun pa rgyal ba'i sras
NK123(go)002:600: po 7gzhan phan mtha' yas 'od zer 'bod pas ru
NK123(go)002:601: dam o rgyan bsam gtan chos gling gi yang dben
NK123(go)002:602: gangs khrod bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas shar
